skill.name: designing-and-implementing
skill.description: Use when receiving feature requests, architectural discussions, or multi-step implementation needs that require design before coding.
skill.summary: Use when receiving feature requests, architectural discussions, or multi-step implementation needs t...
skill.author: BPSAI

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only workflow documentation. No executable code, network calls, filesystem access, or external command execution. This is a guidance-only skill that describes processes and lists CLI commands for the user to run.

content.user_title: Design and implement features with structured planning
content.value_statement: Transforms vague feature requests into clear implementation plans. Guides AI agents through a proven workflow of clarification, design, planning, and execution for complex development tasks.
actual_capabilities: Determines when planning is needed versus direct implementation
Guides requirement clarification and stakeholder alignment
Creates structured feature plans with clear tasks and acceptance criteria
Syncs plans to Trello for sprint planning and tracking
Implements iterative development following TDD practices
limitations: Does not execute code or modify files directly
Relies on user to run CLI commands for plan/task operations
Requires user to provide project context and decisions

use_cases.title: New Feature Development
use_cases.description: Design and plan new features with clear requirements, architectural decisions, and task breakdown

use_cases.title: Architecture Planning
use_cases.description: Evaluate design approaches, propose solutions with trade-offs, and create implementation roadmaps

use_cases.title: Sprint Planning
use_cases.description: Break down features into actionable tasks with priorities, dependencies, and acceptance criteria

prompt_templates.title: Simple Feature Request
prompt_templates.prompt: I want to add [feature]. Please clarify requirements, propose approaches, and create a plan.

prompt_templates.title: Refactoring Project
prompt_templates.prompt: Refactor [component] to improve [aspect]. Identify affected areas, propose migration strategy, and create implementation steps.

prompt_templates.title: Complex Integration
prompt_templates.prompt: Build [feature] that involves [service A] and [service B]. Research existing patterns, propose architecture, and outline tasks.

prompt_templates.title: Architectural Design
prompt_templates.prompt: Design [system/component] for [use case]. Present 2-3 approaches with pros/cons, recommend one, and create detailed implementation plan.

output_examples.input: I want to add user authentication with OAuth2 support
output: Requirements clarified: OAuth2 login flow, token management, user session handling
Approaches proposed: Option A - Full OAuth2 integration, Option B - Third-party service, Option C - Hybrid approach
Plan created with 5 tasks covering provider setup, callback handling, token storage, session management, and testing
Tasks synced to Trello board for sprint planning

best_practices: Start by clarifying requirements before proposing solutions
Present multiple approaches with clear trade-offs
Break work into small, testable increments
anti_patterns: Skipping clarification and jumping straight to code
Planning every detail before any implementation
Working in isolation without updating task status

faq.question: When should I use this skill versus implementing directly?
faq.answer: Use for features, refactors, and multi-step work. Skip for typos, small fixes, and documentation tweaks.

faq.question: What complexity levels are supported?
faq.answer: Tasks use 10-100 complexity scale. Simple features may be 10-30, complex features can exceed 100.

faq.question: How does this integrate with Trello?
faq.answer: Plans sync to Trello with cards for each task, using status labels for tracking progress.

faq.question: Is my project data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only reads local project files you specify. No data is sent externally.

faq.question: Why are my tasks not showing in Trello?
faq.answer: Ensure you ran plan sync-trello command with correct target list. Check board permissions.

faq.question: How does this compare to other planning skills?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on end-to-end feature workflow from design through TDD implementation.
